page.title: 16LIFE-STYLE - CHILDREN 3.
page.content: {MY FAVOURITE sports}are swimming & netball. I am writing a book 'Super Boat S.S.' One day I may get my books published. I go to Scissett Music Centre on Saturdays and on Sunday I play out, riding my bicycle. I hope to live to be 90 but I don't wish a painful death." {EXTRACTS FROM CHILDRENS WRITING:} {DALE ROBERT LOCKWOOD,}10 YRS.{HOBBY -} swimming: "On the days I go swimming it is very hard. I don't like front crawl leg kicking. I can swim 4 miles and I go 4 days each week.My{FAVOURITE {FOOD}is fried bread,chips & sausages." {CHRISTEN SHAW,}10yrs. "{MY FAVOURITE {FOOD}is stew & dumplings. I have {2 {PET CATS,}Purdy & Bonny. {MY FAVOURITE {CLOTHES }are dresses, flourescent pink, yellow & white socks and frilly knickers." {Cont'd { }
